definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: Duanwu Festival is originated in China, and was initially a day to prevent illness.

sentences.english: I have a vaccination last week.
Provide health prevention measures for staff such as vaccinations.

sentences.english: Thirdly, effectively strengthen health and epidemic prevention work.
sentences.chinese: 三是切實加強衛生防疫工作。

sentences.english: All school-aged children require an Immunization Form.

sentences.english: It is the responsibility of the epidemic prevention center to promote epidemic prevention measures.
sentences.chinese: 衛生防疫的宣傳工作，是防疫站的職責。

sentences.english: Article 7 People’s governments at all levels shall strengthen the leadership over animal epidemic prevention.
sentences.chinese: 第七條各級人民政府應當加強對動物防疫工作的領導。
